definition: to be worthwhile/to be worth it
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: It didn't pay to run such a big plant for a few orders.
sentences.chinese: 爲了量訂貨，辦這麼大的廠不上算。

sentences.english: It sounded like a good deal until you read the fine print.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不仔細閱讀契約，你會真以爲這個生意很上算。

definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
